name: embedded-energy-modeling
short_description:
this is an eclipse plug-in based on xeemu virtual harder that is capable of energy consumption monitoring and measurement of a routing protocol that is running on a virtual device.
it is capable of starting N instances of virtual hardware with an OLSRD or AODV instance on them which become connected over a virtual network so a full functional runtime can be triggered a real topology is built and the energy consumed by the process can be measured during the simluation
summary: eclipse plugin for energy measurement with xeemu based virtual platfor
